REST API Exposed by the Gateway¶

URL HTTP Method Name Parameters Return
{base}/ GET getSummary   Collection summary
{base}/fields GET getFields   List of Fields
{base}/records GET getRecords start, count [,orderby] [,fields] [,filter] List of Records
getSummary()¶

Returns a summary of the collection held at this location.

Url :{base}/
Return type:
Returns:
getFields()¶
Returns a list of fields available in records in this collections
Url :{base}/fields
Return type:
Returns:
getRecords()¶

Returns a page of records.

Url :{base}/records
Return type:
Returns:

Example:

curl http://service/base/records?start=0&count=10
